description:
My place is close to Salute Kosher Restaurant. You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood. My place is good for couples, business travelers, and families (with kids).

NICE 1 BEDROOM IN PRIVET HOUSE ON GROUND FLOOR WITH SEPARETED ENTRANCE WITH BACKYARD. 
LIVING ROOM, DINNING ROOM, FULL KITCHEN, FULL BATH, BEDROOM. 
 QUEEN SIZE BED, 1 SOFA BED, 2 DOBLE BEDS, TV, WIFI
I PROVIDE CLEAN SHEETS AND TOWELS. SHAMPO, CONDITIONER, SOAP

I WILL MEET IN THE PLACE AND OPEN A DOOR

LARGE 4 SUPERMARKETS AROUND, RESARANTS, WALK TO 3 MALLS , 5 BANKS, 24 HOUSE GROSERY STORES.

R or M TRAIN TO 63 DRIVE STATION AND WALK 4 BLOCKS. 20 MIN BY TRAIN TO MANHATTAN.  ALSO EXTRESS BUS TO MANHATTAN. LOCAL BUSES AND TAXI AROUND.
name: NICE 1 BEDROOM IN GROUND P/H
review: Place is very small and dirty has no silver wear and is dusty won't go back only good for 1 or two people owner very strict on noise
